title: WTB - Weimer Old Mill and Sovereign
author: TornadoJake

posts.post_title: WTB - Weimer Old Mill and Sovereign
posts.post_content: Hello! I'm working on a back run for Jake Weimer, who was from my hometown. I'm specifically looking for Sovereign 150 and 350 and Old Mill.

Ottumwa, Iowa - never heard of it

Welcome and best of luck
We had residents in T206 and 1933 Goudey (Bud Clancy). Nobody in 1952 Topps unfortunately.
I'm still looking for Old Mill and Sovereign. EPDG, Sweet Cap and Piedmont are also of interest.
